    public void increment(double d) {
        this.value += d * d;
        this.n++;

        this.n = 0L;
        this.value = 0.0d;

            return Double.NaN;

        for (int i3 = i; i3 < i + i2; i3++) {
            double d2 = dArr[i3];
            d += d2 * d2;
        }
        return d;
    }
